# Shield Master (Feat)
## Overview
Your mastery of the shield allows you to fight with it without hindrance.

**Prerequisites**: [[Improved Shield Bash (Feat)|Improved Shield Bash]], [[Shield Proficiency (Feat)|Shield Proficiency]], [[Shield Slam (Feat)|Shield Slam]], [[Two-Weapon Fighting (Feat)|Two-Weapon Fighting]], base attack bonus +11.

**Benefit**: You do not suffer any penalties on attack rolls made with a shield while you are wielding another weapon. Add your shieldâ€™s enhancement bonus to attacks and damage rolls made with the shield as if it was a weapon enhancement bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 133
